content: try out this couch coaster pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/khjr-d-yr2a skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn -orange -yarn needle -scissors final size -each coaster is a square with a 9 cm width
